title: Add setup command for configurable database path
close_reason: Setup command implemented with OS-specific config paths, backups subdirectory support, and full test coverage (24/24 tests passing)

title: Add --all flag to rm command
description: Allow users to remove all variants of a card at once with 'pkm rm --all lang:set:card'
close_reason: Successfully implemented --all flag for rm command. Users can now remove all variants of a card with 'pkm rm --all de:me01:001'. Test coverage added.

title: Fix N+1 query problem in analyzer
description: load_card_with_ownership calls get_owned_cards() for every card, loading all cards 500+ times. Replace with direct lookup function get_card_ownership(tcgdex_id, language). Performance impact: 100-1000x faster for large collections.

title: Fix image URLs to use high quality PNG format
close_reason: Image URLs now use high quality PNG format (/high.png suffix). Tested with German and English cards.

title: Add language filtering to pkm list command
description: Users should be able to filter their collection by language (e.g., pkm list de, pkm list en). Requires adding language column to database and updating list command.
close_reason: Successfully implemented language filtering for pkm list command. Users can now filter by language (e.g., pkm list de, pkm list en) and cards display their language in the list view.

title: Add export/import functionality for database backup
description: Export collection to JSON with timestamp filename, import to replace database
close_reason: Export/import functionality complete and tested. Added export/import commands with timestamped backups, custom filenames, confirmation prompts, and proper error handling. All tests passing (13/13).

title: Optimize statistics calculation to single loop
description: get_collection_statistics uses 6 separate loops over cards list. Refactor to single loop collecting all stats at once. Performance: 6x fewer iterations.

title: Fix duplicate JSON loading in analyze_collection
description: analyze_collection loads the same raw JSON file twice: once in load_card_with_ownership (line 55) and again on line 113. Solution: return raw_data from load_card_with_ownership or add to CardAnalysis. Performance: 2x faster analyzer.

title: Fix wrapper script to find uv in common locations
close_reason: Updated wrapper to check PATH, ~/.cargo/bin/, and ~/.local/bin/ for uv executable

title: Remove card_cache table - use only raw JSON
description: BREAKING CHANGE: card_cache duplicates data in raw JSON files. Causes language confusion (cache stores one name but card exists in multiple languages). Remove cache_card(), get_cached_card(), and entire card_cache table. Impact: -250 LOC, 33% faster writes, no sync issues, fixes language bug.

title: Rarity column should use English terms instead of translated terms
close_reason: Rarity now always fetched from English API regardless of card language. Tested with German, French, and English cards.

title: Add curl-based installation script
close_reason: Installation script complete with curl-based install, auto-update, uninstall, and README documentation. Tested successfully.
